text: Liam Reilly (29 January 1955 â€“ 1 January 2021) was an Irish pop rock singer- songwriter and keyboardist. He was a member of the group Bagatelle. He was born in Dundalk, Ireland. He participated in the 1990 Eurovision Song Contest with his single "Somewhere in Europe". He also wrote the 1991 Eurovision Irish submission "Could It Be That I'm in Love". Reilly died suddenly at his home in Dundalk on 1 January 2021 at the age of 65. ==References== Category:1955 births Category:2021 deaths Category:Irish singer-songwriters Category:Irish musicians Category:Keyboardists Category:Irish rock musicians Category:Irish pop singers Category:Eurovision Song Contest entrants
title: Liam Reilly
